branchCategory.name: C(D)J2-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Environmental Options
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CJ2-Z environmental resistant options are designed for tough environments and is still the lightweight, double acting, single rod, stainless steel tube air cylinders. Available in 10 and 16mm bore sizes with stroke lengths from 15mm to 200mm. Available in 7 mounting types for versatility. Pivot and rod end brackets can be ordered with the cylinder under one part number.</p>
